chunk:
Herbaliz Fine Facial Oil, Skin Balancing

Brand: Herbaliz

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Calendula Officinalis (Pot Marigold)*, Plantago Major (Plantain)*, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf*, Rose Hips Seed Oil*, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil*, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*, Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium)

Leaf*, Rose Hips Seed Oil*, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil*, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*, Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium) Oil*, Salvia Sclarea (Clary Sage) Oil, Tocopherol.*Certified Organic

Directions: Start with one or two drops on clean fingertips. Dot on face and neck; gently smooth into skin. Use morning and evening as a moisturizer to improve your skin's texture and radiance. Apply to wet skin to add moisture. A spritz with an Herbaliz Moisture Mist, Skin Refresher, or some mineral water beforehand would be nice.

Warnings: No preservatives. Keep away from heat and sun. Not for internal use. Keep out of eyes. Use within one year of purchase.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
